creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cerise satin trimmed with gold braid in manner of 35.7.209; back and sides of small alternating black and red printed designs on white cotton; lined with coarse white linen; looks as if recently made from older materials
dimension:
21 in. (53.34 cm) (shoulder to bottom)
51 in. (129.54 cm) (circumference at bottom)
title: Vest
